name: places/ChIJPYwkvPbzwokR8ZbA3o1Vedk
adrFormatAddress: 4975 Broadway, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: To our NYC friends: Susanna is absolutely the best agent we've ever worked with -- patient, knowledgeable, experienced, and a great problem-solver. Her advice about every aspect of selling our apartment, from how to stage it, what repairs to make, how to price it, etc., were head and shoulders above the ideas other agents had offered. We took her advice at every turn and she was always right. Plus she got us through many nail-biting moments and was always available to offer reassurance when we needed it. When she says she'll work harder than anyone else on your behalf, she's telling the truth. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: I have worked with Susanna and her clients for 10+ years and I can say without equivocation that she is a terrific real estate agent!  Very knowledgeable, incredibly quick to respond and has the highest ethical standards.  Love working with her!

text.text: I have worked with Susanna and her clients for 10+ years and I can say without equivocation that she is a terrific real estate agent!  Very knowledgeable, incredibly quick to respond and has the highest ethical standards.  Love working with her!

originalText.text:
100% recommend working with Susanna!

I found Susanna though one of her listings on StreetEasy - I had no intention to buy, but my landlord had given an unexpected (50%) increase for the apartment I'd been renting, so figured that it would be worth at least considering looking at some co-ops.

My first impression before we even met was how organized and detail oriented Susanna was - after reaching out to view a couple of her listings before we even met for the first time we were corresponding over email for the types of things that were important for me in an apartment so that she could find other listings to view as well (a great kitchen for me, and lots of sunny spots for bird watching for my beloved cat).

The second impression when we met was immediate integrity: real estate in NYC doesn't have the greatest reputation for honesty... from exaggerated details in listings, to bait-and-switch photographs that doesn't represent the property (or are of a completely different property) I was relieved to see that Susanna's listings accurately represent what they look like in real life. And unlike some agents or brokers that I've interacted with who just want to make a quick deal, I always felt that Susanna was patient and wanted to make sure that I found the place that was right for me.

It's not an exaggeration to say that I was a very nervous client - not only with crazy market volatility in interest rates, but as a first time buyer just seeing the prices on listings sent me into a mild panic.

As well as helping me find great listings to consider, Susanna also gave me some more general advice around how to think about an offer (e.g. size of down payment) and convinced me to meet with a financial advisor to make sure that I was making a financially healthy suggestion.

Along with putting in my offer, Susanna also helped with her network - connecting me with an attorney, and even making an introduction to a loan officer - I'd initially gotten pre-approval with my primary bank, but I got a MUCH better rate and first-time buyer package from the introduction Susanna made.

Finally, working towards closing, I had some tight dates to meet with my lease ending in my old apartment, and Susanna helped keep things moving along when they were stalling with the seller.

At the start of 2022 I had no intention of even moving apartments, let alone making the switch from renting to owning, and now at the end of 2022 I'm in this amazing co-op - I'm so happy that I had the good fortune to meet Susanna who was able to help me on this journey.

I've just crossed 3-months in my new home and I can't believe how lucky I am to have this apartment - the neighborhood, the building, the amazing light, it's like a dream come true! Thank you Susanna!!

originalText.text:
As novice apartment buyers, Susanna Saarinen was everything we could hope for in a broker. She was cheerful, thoughtful, patient and empathetic to our bouts of nerves. She was happy to show us or arrange for us to be shown any number of apartments, giving counsel but not pushing her opinions on us.

We ultimately bought our dream apartment but not without the requisite nightmares that seem to accompany real estate deals in New York. The process was tedious, arcane, terrifying and frustrating all at the same time, and at every bump in the road, Susanna was our steady hand and shoulder to cry on. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend her.

originalText.text: Susanna at Access Property Group has served as my real estate broker and more recently as an advisor regarding my re-finance. She helped me purchase my first home in NYC and was fantastic! Susanna pushed me a little bit out of my comfort zone into a excellent investment and I have never been happier. She was supportive, communicative, efficient, and accurate on all accounts. She knew the ins and outs of the co op board and has been a fantastic resource to this day. Highly, highly recommend!
